评论详情: My grandson got married at a RenFair, and everyone dressed up. I must have tried 10 dresses, but this one was perfect. So much fun.
Order bigger then what you normally would wear wife wear a large to xl depending on the cut and has to order a 4x to get a decent fit

I love this top and I'm glad that I went with the recommended size because it fits perfectly. This definitely has renaissance/witch vibes, which is perfect for a fair that I'm going to towards the end of the month. Personally, I think the material of the top is sturdy, however it is slightly see-through, so I would recommend wearing an undergarment of the same color underneath. The sleeves are just the right length and the lace is a nice touch as well. Sure, it's a little pricey, but it's worth it. If you want it, I highly recommend getting it.

The fit and drape are wonderful and the color is beautiful. Unfortunately, the fabric is pretty clingy so it's botersome to me on the fitted portion. If you don't have back fat, it should be fine. I need to lose a few pounds before I feel comfortable wearing it out. Expect a synthetic texture, but not as cheap as costume fabric. I think it will wash well as long as it's hung to dry.
The material is pretty soft and stretchy. I did have to buy 2 sizes up. It does a good job of hiding my fat rolls and flattering my fridge shaped figure.

I was looking for a place to write a review for this company. I am beyond happy to be able to find you all. Your tops fit beautifully. And I love that I finally found a place that matches my Victorian/Witchy vibes in outfits. You are the best!

I was looking for something to wear to an Irish concert and pleased I found this top. I normally wear a size small (114 lbs 5'2") but followed the reviews of other customers and sized up to a medium. However, I do think it's true to size and I could have bought my normal size. Fortunately, the adjustable corset bust line and tie in the back will make this work for me. The quality is very nice., I'm happy with the purchase.

评论概述: Check the size before you order.
评论详情: Was glad I read reviews saying it run small, by two sizes. I did order up and it fit, snugly on the arms. Did not shrink when washed in cold water and hung to dry. Cute part of my pirate costume. Would buy again.
This is the same fabric and quality that I find in cheap Halloween costumes, but with department store prices. I'm somewhat disappointed. It is pretty though.
This product went far beyond my expectations. It arrived quickly, fit perfectly and is so soft and comfortable.  I can't wait to wear it to my pirate party tomorrow!
I honestly wanted to not like this top because of the price, I feel guilty about spending a lot on myself being a mom of 2. But I looked so good in this top I had to keep it
Very comfortable and looks lovely on. Make sure to use the sizing provided as I normally wear  a 2x or 3x but had to buy a 5x

Amazed at how quickly this top arrived! I only ordered yesterday. Super fast shipping. And by following the size chart, the fit is perfect! The husband says it looks great. The material is so soft and has just a bit of give to keep it comfortable. Can't wait to wear it to the Maine Witch Walk in a couple weeks!

This was a little more money than I like to spend on a single top, but I can without hesitation advise that the fabric and construction are well worth the price.  I will say that I reviewed this as being "too small" only because I took the advice of many other reviewers when I up-sized for this item.  I am a solid 2X and I purchased a 3X which fits like all my other 2X tops.  So in reality it is too small for ordering your usual size but up-sizing will make it "fit as expected".  This is a very flattering top for women who have a larger middle section and I absolutely love the renaissance detail. I purchased the purple color and it is true to what is advertised.  I really love this top and I'm sure it will become one of my favorites.  I'm looking to buy another one or two to add to wardrobe.

评论概述: It was perfect for my pirate outfit
评论详情: I followed the size guide and ended up with a size 4X. I wish I had gone down size, but my students LOVED IT.
It was definitely not true to size(too small) so I had to return it which was unfortunate because I loved the look and quality.

评论概述: Flattering design. Nicely made. Soft lightweight material.
评论详情: When the tiny package arrived, I was very nervous, but this top is actually very nice. I am 4'10" and 135 lbs with large bustline. I ordered a large, which is the size shirt I normally purchase for everyday clothes and this fit me perfectly. The material is soft and lightweight. It stretches just enough to hug your curves and look flattering. The sleeves are so nice! I ordered the plum color which is like a deep eggplant, not a bright purple. I'm wearing this to a one time special event at a Renn Faire in the spring, so I can't comment on how well it washes, but for now, I am happy with this purchase.
Ordered this for my girlfriend and she loves it. It's true it ruins a bit small but I planned ahead and looks great
Great colors.  Definitely polyester.  Runs about 1-2 sizes small.  Pretty.  Sad that it didn't fit.

评论概述: Bought for sister, she loves it!
评论详情: Color was accurate to images, she wanted to go to the renaissance festival as a fairy this year, so she wanted something pretty but earth tones. She is absolutely in love with this. It is comfortable on her, with breathing room and a whimsical flow that I believe she wanted to achieve. The ties are adjustable. So glad I could get this for her. Definitely recommend following the size guide "Dare to Wear" has posted for their clothing. Since I didn't have her exact measurements I just ordered two sizes larger than what she wears, and it worked for us. She is shorter, so it looks like a knee length dress on her but she doesn't mind at all.

评论概述: Nice top for a Renaissance Faire!
评论详情: This costume top is thin/cool, but does run small. I wear a 2x normally and the 4x fits me perfectly. Very flattering in the cut/shape. Good buy!

I really love flowy clothing. I liked how I could tie the "corset" as loose or as tight as I wanted. There's only one drawback, polyester/spandex is kinda hot in the dry Arizona summer. But, this won't stop me from wearing it! I plan on getting a dress too.

I absolutely adore these tops. The very first one I purchased was the black one with roses on it . I then proceeded to purchase the burgundy  (which is like a wine red), purple, green, and now this beautiful midnight blue one. These are so beautiful and flattering. My bust size is 42dd and my height is 5'4". I can fit in the 2x and 3x These are absolutely the most beautiful tops I own. I have hips and they really flatter my hips very nicely.  These are nice cool fabrics and stretchy. I can wear these tops year round with a jacket in the winte be prepared to get loads of compliments in these tops. Next pay check I'm planning on buying more of these.

评论概述: Great top and fit comfortably for Pirate night dress up on cruise
评论详情: Purchased this for my wife for our cruise as one of the nights was themed for Pirate night and she loved the look of it online. Once received, She said it fit comfortably and the material breathed nicely considering were in a rather tropical and humid climate. Item matched in same color and appearance as it was presented online. Product was shipped to us in a timely manner and as described. She said she would recommend this product for use for Pirate night or themed parties.
Color is nice. Material is thin and cheap.

This pretty top is way nicer than I thought it would be! Has bling that I was not expecting. Very happy about that! Also glad that there is give in the fabric, I was worried it would be too tight. I will be wearing this to my daughters Steam Punk themed wedding.
Ran a little small bit a nice outfit.  Looks nice
It is gorgeous but to small. Returning.
The colors are stunning, the sizing charts are accurate, and the material feels amazing. Best dress top I've found in a while.

评论概述: Bad Fit and Design. Cheap fabric.
评论详情: This dress is a similar design to one I purchased a few years ago from the same seller, but is not the same fit or quality fabric. The design runs small and has a very high waist. Additionally, what should be considered a waist band (in black lace) does not wrap around the waist, but appears only in the front, which looks odd. I am returning the item.
I’m a plus size women, and this shirt is very flattering. As with most renaissance and corset type clothing, I recommend sizing up at least one size

评论概述: When ordering go one size up. If I had ordered my regular size it would have been too tight
评论详情: Bought for a part of a costume but will be able to wear other wise

评论概述: Great top for the Ren Fest
评论详情: Based on the size chart, it said I needed a 3X.  One of the prior reviews said that, if you have heavy arms, go up a size.  Due to the span on the sizing, I went with the 3X.  When it arrived, it was very big and more than generous in the upper arms.  I then reordered this top, in a 1X.  I was so happy when it arrived today.  It fit perfect.  The arms were not tight and it was so much more flattering.  I guess it just depends on how you are built.  I normally take a L-1X, so this is pretty much my usual size.  Can't wait to wear it to the Ren Fest with my boots!
I love the shirt. Just keep this in mine. I normally wear an XL, but the 2X for best in my opinion, so order up a size or two.
It was great

评论概述: Beautiful tho' color darker than expected
评论详情: The "walnut" color is darker than in image, closer to black, so there's not as much contrast between the black and brown as I expected. Still, it's beautiful and just what teen wanted for birthday. It's pricier than what I would have expected or preferred, but it's what was available. It's brought lots of happiness, so it was worth it.
For us full figure gals, this fit great.  Normally a 2-3x so had to order a 5x.  Fabric looks and feels great.
This item seems to be costume quality, rather than clothing quality. Unfortunately I missed the return window. It also definitely runs small.
Run small

I took the measurements like it said and it was so small I couldn't even get it on. I ordered it in the usual size that I wear. I am returning it. That material was super thin and flimsy. It felt like the material that Halloween costumes are made out of

I wore this to a Renaissance fair. I bought a 2x. My measurements are 43 35 44. It fit perfectly. There is a little stretch to it. I was expecting cheap Halloween costume fabric. It was not see through. It does not wrinkle easily. Nice and flowy. I bought a cream colored skirt from Amazon to wear under. It wasn't as hot as I expected. I was able to wear it for about 4 hours of walking without being uncomfortable in 77° weather.

评论概述: Good product, order a size up
评论详情: I liked the product but I would definitely order a size up. Looked great just tight in some areas like arms.
Very tight fit. Seemed cheap. Had to return

Shirt is lovely! I bought 2 sizes bigger than my normal size based on other people's suggestions. The color was right and fabric was nice. The arms fit me fine, but they are definitely smaller than you'd think for a 3X. I would pass on this shirt if you have bigger upper arms.
Loved the feel of the material and size fit perfect and wash all was great.

I bought this on a whim. It looked pretty but I want sure it would fit well. I bought it based on my bust size. It fits perfectly. Any smaller and I'd be busting out! 😂 The shirt is soft, flowy, and a beautiful color. I get compliments when I wear it. The loose fabric at the bottom isn't bunchy and doesn't stick out. It falls nicely and covers my stomach. The arms fit well. My only complaint is that the strings to tie corseted area are really long. They could stand to lose an inch or two so they don't hang so far. Bought another shirt because I love this one so much.
This is now my favorite shirt. I got an xl. I usually wear a large but glad I went up a size because of my bust. The material stretchy and soft. I love it.

Got this shirt to dress up a bit instead of a dress for the renaissance festival, my family likes it and I really like it, I got a 2x which is my normal size and it fits perfect, I like how it clings in the right places. It does have a string in the back to tie, if you raised your arm up the sleeves are cut so it stops at elbow the rest of the arm is covered, I like the cut on the neck and the cut on the bottom and back. The ribbon is long but not a issue to me and I like how it incorporates the corset look in the front. I would recommend and may buy another color with extra cash.
The top fits perfectly with plenty of stretch

评论概述: I get compliments on this blouse
评论详情: I like how this looks, feels & fits on me. Looks great on the girls (I have a large bust) and the style downplays my abdomen. I've only worn it a couple times so far, but get multiple compliments each time.

I’m having a table at Gem City Comic Con in Dayton Ohio 2022 for my own Fantasy Novel Book Series to support reading. This shirt is perfect to wear at my Eirinth table in style for me as a Fantasy Writer. Great price too! 🥰

评论概述: The color is not as vivid as what you see online.

I love how soft and flowy this is. it's very comfortable and not at all uncomfortable.
Beautiful
I LOVE my top. A little pricey, but whatever. The only dock I'll give is that the ribbons... are cheap ribbon. Otherwise, it is well made, stretchy, and fits beautifully.

Very sexy, perfect for busty women. Showcases curves well. Fit like a glove. Thin material but felt comfy. Wore it out to go buy groceries and already received a compliment on it. I love it and also bought it in black. Will try other colors also.  Bought the purple and now the black. Love them both. Try to match your bra to the color of the top you get and the thin material won’t matter.
Beautiful shirt, flattering fit. Sexy bustline. I ordered one size up, fit perfect.
Super cute, but not a corset top. It looks like a corset, but the front laces are just for show.
If I look good in this wearing a 1x anyone can look good it this very sexy blouse, but modest. I love the way it looks and feels. I will probably order another one.4
Love this top. I have had many great comments when I wear.
The material this is made out of is the cheapest nylon knit and way sheer for this style of shirt. $55 for $5 worth of fabric! If I didn't need it for a costume, I would send it back.

评论概述: Beautiful shirts for women who love dark gothic like style
评论详情: I bought a bunch of these from the website before I knew there was an Amazon store which is why it isn't a verified purchase. I will probably end up buying a different one on Amazon just to put a verified review.  I love these shirts. They're comfortable and flattering. I wore an outfit on a recent TV show which included the Damask leggings and the black and purple shirt. The leggings were so soft and fluffy it was like wearing clouds. I totally recommend these shirts for everyday wear and cosplay or acting. Get one and start a trend.

This top is very flattering for a busty plus size woman. Very well made, exactly the same as picture. I'm 5'7 so I was worried it wouldn't be as long on me, but had good length. Highly recommend. I wear a 26 in women's, the 5xl fit perfectly.
